text: This man was known to have left his home on February 11, and to have been away for four days. Not in itself a crime, but, added to the knowledge that he had gone shopping in the town of Guildford for a false moustache, it left him with something feeling that a moustache might enhance his military bearing), and this was accepted.
handwritten_text: This mon wa known to have left his howe on Februory 1land
